message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product for $12000. It's a fantastic deal, and I'm confident you'll love it. Let me know if you're interested!
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a budget to stick to.

I understand that you have a budget to stick to, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $10500. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny!

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. I'm really interested in it, but I need to make sure it fits within my means.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9500. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, so I'll offer it to you for $11000. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll find it's worth the investment!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9000 for the product. I'm really interested in it, and I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
